Row.Text: A district unique to Arabia for religious activity. Replaces the Holy Site district and cheaper to build. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Grants an additional standard adjacency to the Campus district. Provides a [ICON_GreatScientist] Great Scientist point instead of a [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet point. Gains +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith adjacency if a Worship Building has been built.

Replace.Text: The Worship Building of Arabia's religion is 90% cheaper to purchase with [ICON_Faith] Faith and provides +15% [ICON_Science] Science, [ICON_Culture] Culture, and [ICON_Faith] Faith to Arabian cities.

May select any religious belief, including those already selected by other civilizations. Automatically receive the final [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet when the next-to-last one is claimed (if you have not earned a [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet already).
